attributes.action: Limit HGV's over 7.5 tonne from using roads during day light hours..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Limiting large HGV's to driving at night when roads are less congested with vulnerable cars will increase safety and reduce daytime congestion. 
Whenver there is an accident on a motorway, it always seems that a lorry is involved, often with fatal consequences. Whoever is at fault is irrelevant, as the size of the lorry means that drivers of smaller vehicles involved are going to come off worse.
